Tax Stamp.definition: a stamp affixed to an item as evidence that a tax on it has been paid ;esp
Tax Stamp.origin: [an additional count of failure to purchase a tax stamp ]

1.1: a stamp affixed to an item as evidence that a tax on it has been paid

2.1: one that the dealer of a controlled substance is required to purchase by payment of a tax according to a state law [an additional count of failure to purchase a
